abstract: It’s tough to be seen as a successful billionaire businessman who is also an outsider trying to work for the little guy.
snippet: It’s tough to be seen as a successful billionaire businessman who is also an outsider trying to work for the little guy.
lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump has laid out his economic vision, and it included deep tax cuts for the wealthy, tearing up climate change agreements and abandoning trade deals. He insisted, “We can’t fix a rigged system by relying on the people who rigged it in the first place,” highlighting the fine line that he has to tread between between being anti-elite and yet absolutely elite. It’s tough to be seen as a successful billionaire businessman who is also an outsider trying to work for the little guy.

headline.main: Trump’s Economic Agenda and the Team Behind It
